mapper.insert: INSERT INTO x_user ( user_no, user_nm, user_rank, user_pos, user_email, user_pwd, user_phone, group_id, group_nm, user_deleted, insert_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{userNm}, #{userRank}, #{userPos}, #{userEmail}, #{userPwd}, #{userPhone}, #{groupNo}, #{groupNm}, '0', now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE x_user SET user_nm=#{userNm}, user_rank=#{userRank}, user_pos=#{userPos}, user_phone=#{userPhone}, group_id=#{groupId}, group_nm=#{groupNm} update_time = now() WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.delete: DELETE from x_user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND user_email = #{userEmail}
